long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that works on all webpages, has a text to speech feature to read the webpage aloud to you. Also has a colour overlay option that only highlights paragraphs of text to not obscure the images like normal overlays and has a built in little dictionary so you can search a word quickly without having to open another tab. It is also in a dyslexia friendly font, with large buttons and a large interface.
